content: {"name": "St. Louis de Montfort Catholic Comm.-Sally Burton Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Open to Hamilton Co residents. Clients will be allowed 1/month.\n\nState-issued Photo ID One document showing proof of address (mail, lease, rent receipt) required.", "email": "", "url": "https://sldmfishers.org/sally-burton-food-pantry-sbfp-food-delivery-to-seniors", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "11441 Hague Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Fishers", "state_province": "IN", "postal_code": "46038", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9519364, "longitude": -86.032005}, "phones": [{"number": "(317) 842-6778", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "22:00", "closes_at": "23:15"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}]}
